abstract.t: OSPFv2 and OSPFv3 include a reliable flooding mechanism todisseminate routing topology and Traffic Engineering (TE) informationwithin a routing domain. Given the effectiveness of thesemechanisms, it is convenient to envision using the same mechanism fordissemination of other types of information within the domain.However, burdening OSPF with this additional information will impactintra-domain routing convergence and possibly jeopardize thestability of the OSPF routing domain. This document presentsmechanism to relegate this ancillary information to a separate OSPFinstance and minimize the impact.
